properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descriptio:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing

 Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling 
in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ 
Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m

properties.Observatio: Paddy fields are being submerged by water from the Kandura
properties.Descriptio:
Supplying of boulder and selected rubble 
(locally )

Placing and aligning boulders in stable positions
Labour

Supplyning of 1.5m x 1.0m x 1.0m Gabion box

Transport cost for gabion box & misc

Miscellaneous

Contigencies (10%)
